title.narrative: Support For Community-Based, Participatory City Development Strategies In Seven Vietnamese Cities (Cities Alliance)

description.narrative: The project aims to help the cities to achieve stronger local economic development, better social equity and environmental sustainability, based on the current socio-economic data and real market trends through promotion of strategic planning approach. The CDS is a tool to help the local city governments develop comprehensive strategy for municipal development, link public funding with local amenity investment as well as to improve urban quality of life and citizenship through poverty reduction and more inclusive, effective city governance.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services

department.narrative: Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Awareness and capacities of five project network cities (Viet Tri, Hai Duong, Hung Yen, Ha Tinh and Ben Tre) improved for replication of community-based, participatory City Development Strategy approach

description.narrative: Awareness and capacities of five project network cities (Viet Tri, Hai Duong, Hung Yen, Ha Tinh and Ben Tre) improved for replication of community-based, participatory City Development Strategy approach

title.narrative: Some 200 participants from the five cities have been provided with documents and experiences from the CDS formulation process in Tam Ky and Quy Nhon, while wide rage of citizens have benefitted from overall CDS networking and subsequent replication opportunities

description.narrative: Some 200 participants from the five cities have been provided with documents and experiences from the CDS formulation process in Tam Ky and Quy Nhon, while wide rage of citizens have benefitted from overall CDS networking and subsequent replication opportunities

baseline.value: -Weak local ownership, understanding and adoption of the previous CDS processes in Vietnamese cities. - Lack of coordination between and follow up by cities.

comment.narrative: Training materials, handouts, workshop and training proceedings

target.value: Regular feedback to the shared CDS process documents and experiences provided by the Steering Committees of the five cities. - Dissemination workshops, exchange and training organised in the five cities on the CDS process for learning and application. -Progress reports, a final report and post-project workplans prepared by the five cities using participatory process.

comment.narrative: Training materials, handouts, workshop and training proceedings

title.narrative: Cities of Tam Ky and Quy Nhon are supported to formulate and apply community-based, participatory City Development Strategies, incorporating provincial level provisions

description.narrative: Cities of Tam Ky and Quy Nhon are supported to formulate and apply community-based, participatory City Development Strategies, incorporating provincial level provisions

title.narrative: Full final draft CDS prepared and disseminated by Tam Ky and Quy Nhon using participatory process, Exact progress tracking method will be designed with the two cities during the project inception phase

description.narrative: Full final draft CDS prepared and disseminated by Tam Ky and Quy Nhon using participatory process, Exact progress tracking method will be designed with the two cities during the project inception phase

baseline.value: The People's Committees of Tam Ky and Quy Nhon and the provincial People's Committee have identified severe shortcomings in the existing city planning process. - the City and Provicial People's Committees lack adequate capacities to improve the planning process with regard to solving resettlement, climate change, infrastructure and housing issues. - Tam Ky and Quy Nhon have active CDF network. Tam Ky has prepared an up-to-date, participatory Provincial Development Strategy.

comment.narrative: Draft and final CDS documents, project reports, media announcements, training materials, study tour report, technical and research reports, thematic map

target.value: -Implementation mechanism and process plan for CDS designed. -Final CDS linked to investment and implementation plans. - CDS task forces and working groups formed and assisted to acquire relevant technical capacities.

comment.narrative: Draft and final CDS documents, project reports, media announcements, training materials, study tour report, technical and research reports, thematic map

title.narrative: Community-based, participatory City Development Strategy approach has been promoted by the national government and partner cities for institutionalization and application for cities throughout Viet Nam

description.narrative: Community-based, participatory City Development Strategy approach has been promoted by the national government and partner cities for institutionalization and application for cities throughout Viet Nam

title.narrative: - The CDS project experiences have been shared regionally and nationally through media and university exposure and VUF, thereby promoting the institutionalization of CDS in the planning legislation in Viet Nam and contributing to the multi-sectoral, integrating function of the forthcoming proposed National Urban Development Strategy (NUDS).

description.narrative: - The CDS project experiences have been shared regionally and nationally through media and university exposure and VUF, thereby promoting the institutionalization of CDS in the planning legislation in Viet Nam and contributing to the multi-sectoral, integrating function of the forthcoming proposed National Urban Development Strategy (NUDS).

baseline.value: -No concerted effort made nationally to institutionalize the CDS approach in the planning and legislation. - A growing number of planning professionals of the government, in the private sector, civil society and the donor community in Viet Nam support the CDS principles and methodology as a base of policy and practice reforms.

comment.narrative: - A CDS process papers in Vietnamese and English, regular VUF website postings on progress, exhibition and display materials, media coverage.

target.value: - A process record paper prepared on the CDS experience for the seven project cities, focusing on the rationale for institutionalization.- A final project summary report prepared. - An end-of-the-project CDS meeting arranged as a special VUF event.

comment.narrative: - A CDS process papers in Vietnamese and English, regular VUF website postings on progress, exhibition and display materials, media coverage.
